title: Interpretation of seeing stones in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: I LikeFansSubscribersFansInterpretation of seeing stones in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi symbolizes distress and anguish, and the larger the size of the stone, the greater the pain that is expected from wealth and abundance of food.Interpretation of seeing stones in a dreamSeeing moving stones in a dream indicates false testimony and slander in many colors on your face when dealing with People. But if the dreamer sees that he is throwing stones at the house of an infidel, then this indicates a call to the people of that house. Therefore, seeing a stone from a catapult indicates the cruelty of the recipient in the dream. I saw myself throwing stones from a high place, and the dream symbolizes oppression and injustice. Also, picking up stones from The earth in a dream indicates resistance and constant struggle. Picking up stones from the earth symbolizes overcoming the difficulties of reality and obstacles that the dreamer faces. I saw you in a dream. Stones falling from my hands. The vision symbolizes weakness, vulnerability and humor. A stone in a dream shows a son who disobeys his parents and is unscrupulous. Throwing Stones in a dream indicate that you are vulnerable to injustice and tyranny. Since women throwing stones is a sign of chaos and heresy in religion, may God forgive us and you. See also: - Interpretation of seeing red bricks in a dream. Interpretation of a white stone in a dream. A white stone in a dream is a symbol of good luck for its bearer and a good life. The white color in the dream indicates the longevity of the dreamer or symbolizes a beautiful woman in reality. Seeing many white stones in a country in a dream indicates the prices of cheap goods and products in that country. But if the dreamer occupies a high position and sees the white stone In a dream, this is a sign that he will remain in this position for a long time. When you look at a white stone in a dream and hit it and water comes out of it, the vision symbolizes the acquisition of many goods and doors of livelihood for the dreamer. As for the dreamer removing stones in a dream, this indicates difficulties And the many problems that he goes through in his life. You saw a statue in a dream of a white stone. It symbolizes good deeds in one’s life, many good deeds and reaching people. But if the dreamer sees him walking on many white stones in a dream, this indicates the great suffering that he is going through. In his real life, he carried many stones, some of which were white and silver in color. This is good news of recovery from illness, and God knows best. Interpretation of walking on stones in a dream for a single woman. A stone in a dream for a free girl means approaching a person of status and prestige and marrying him. As for seeing a stone in a dream with water coming out of it, this is a sign of... Food, kindness and a lot of money after difficulties. Seeing small stones in a dream is collecting money and you will get it in one fell swoop. Stepping on a stone for an unmarried girl in a dream indicates difficult tasks that this girl will have to do. Dream of someone flying only Small pebbles in a dream symbolize Hypocrisy and envy. You saw in a dream that a stranger threw stones, which indicates his courage, strength, and escape from his attempt.

title: Interpretation of dreams of my lover talking to his ex-girlfriend in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my lover talking to his ex-girlfriend in a dream Scholars have put forward many interpretations that refer to the lover, so we present the interpretation of a dream about my lover talking to his ex-girlfriend in a dream.. Interpretation of dreams about my lover talking to his ex-girlfriend in a dream Interpretation of dreams about my lover talking to his ex-girlfriend in a dream. We did not find any specific interpretations for seeing this. However, seeing her lover’s betrayal may indicate her lover’s intense love for her, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a single girl sees her lover’s betrayal in a dream, this may be evidence of a health crisis and she must stand by him, God knows best. When she sees a lover cheating on his girlfriend, this may indicate the lover’s success, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about marrying an ex-girlfriend in a dream Interpretation of a dream about marrying an ex-girlfriend in a dream may indicate that you are thinking about the lover, and God is Most High and All-Knowing Where the vision of a single young man marrying his ex-girlfriend may indicate his inability to give up his love for her, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl dreams of marrying her ex-lover, this may indicate that she is not free from the memories of her love for the lover, and God knows best. It can also lead to thinking about the past and the inability to think about the future, God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about not marrying a lover in a dream Interpretation of a dream about not marrying a lover in a dream We did not find specific interpretations to see this, except that seeing her parents rejecting her marriage to her lover may lead to problems with the family, God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream a refusal Her parents marrying her lover, it may be a sign of problems and conflict with the family When you see your parents refusing to marry your lover in a dream, it may be a sign of family problems, and God knows best. When an unmarried girl sees her boyfriend stealing from her in a dream, this may indicate different things about her lover, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees his friend stealing from his house, this may indicate marriage to the people of the house, and God knows best Interpretation of a dream that my friend curses me in a dream Interpretation of a dream that my friend curses me in a dream Perhaps the curse of the owner of the dream will lead to hatred of the aggressor, and God knows best When you see someone cursing, it may be evidence of bad things, and God knows best If a young man is seen insulting another person, it may express bad luck, and God knows best Insulting another person can also indicate a loss that has befallen the owner of the dream, and God knows best Interpretation of a dream about my friend who bothers me in Dream Interpretation of a dream about my friend who is bothering me in a dream If you see someone you know upset in a dream, it can indicate problems and disputes, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. Likewise, if the dreamer sees someone upset and angry, it may indicate problems with him, and God knows best When you see your friend upset

title: Interpretation of the blind person in a dream. The meaning of blindness in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of helping a blind person, one suffering from blindness, a blind child, who does not see clearly, my sister is blind, a dream of restoring sight to a single woman, to a married woman, to a pregnant woman. Interpretation of blindness and lack of vision in a dream. Blindness in a dream is an illusion about debt and loss of money on the part of a suspicious person, and he who sees it as if Blind, it affects wealth, wealth, ownership, and prestige, if he was originally poor or needy. Blindness in interpretation indicates forgetfulness of the Qur’an, religion, or virtue, as God Almighty said in Surah Taha (He said, “My Lord, why have you blinded me while I see?” Verse (125). He sees that someone else has blinded him, then it misleads him and pushes him to sin. Seeing blind people in dreams means loss, and whoever sees himself blind or blind and wearing new clothes, he will suffer from anxiety or fatigue. If the dreamer or his partner sees as if a man is helping him regain his sense of sight or sight, This person will have a guardian who will guide him in all his guidance, repentance, or conversion. Blindness in a dream can indicate a man’s lack of activity. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is blind, she will receive very happy news that she cannot believe or imagine, and there is no harm. Or evil in this dream. A married woman who sees or feels in a dream that she has become blind and lost her sight, then she must review her calculations or behavior towards her husband and family, because her blindness indicates escaping the truth, whether they are wrong decisions, behavior or beliefs. The good thing in this dream is that A married woman regains her sight, and this interpretation also applies to pregnant women. Some people see in their dreams as if they lost their sight suddenly or temporarily, and this interpretation is better, God willing, because temporary blindness in the interpretation is a bad event that the dreamer avoids or overcomes quickly and does not leave a negative impact. The return of the vision in dreams indicates a return. To the right path or to find a solution to intractable issues. Seeing a close person who has become blind, such as (brother, sister, father, mother, husband, wife) shows this person’s maze and confusion. Perhaps the dream indicates his inability or shortcomings towards himself first and then towards others. The good thing about this The dream is that this person regains his sight and vision after losing it. This indicates spiritual salvation or healing. Blindness in children is not good in visions because it portends bad news and failure. A blind child in visions portends bad luck just like a child. This interpretation remains true until that child regains his sight in the dream, and therefore it is good news and a new hope for the monarch. Blindness indicates when The dead indicate illusion, delusion, and uncertainty. It was said: The known dead person, if he appears blind or deaf, in the interpretation symbolizes evil that will come to the dreamer. It was said: It is a mistake or a sin, and it is not good in dreams for the dreamer to follow the blind dead person in the dream, as it indicates bad fate. Or illicit intent. The good thing in dreams is that the dead person sees after blindness, because in the interpretation it means the return of truth and the disappearance of falsehood and falsehood. It is also good for the blind fortune teller to heal the blind dead person so that he can see through a recipe or food offered to the dead person, such as fruit or a drink such as honey or...

title: Interpretation of seeing a camel in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a camel by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a camel in a dream as symbolizing a woman, especially a good woman, a palm tree, or a ship. One of the places where a camel is seen in a dream is that if he dreams that he has a camel and is not married, then it is good news of his marriage, and whoever sees that a camel is milking in the mosque or green spaces, this means that this is good news for a fruitful year. And if his city is in a state of war or conflict, then this Evidence of the end of these conflicts. Whoever sees that camel meat is cooked, this indicates a permissible animal, and sometimes it indicates the fulfillment of a vow, and whoever sees that he is milking a camel, this means that he will earn his money and drive it. This is evidence of his marriage to an honest and obedient wife. When a person sees that he bought a camel in a dream and he is poor, this means that God will open one of the greatest doors of sustenance for him. Interpretation of Al-Nabulsi’s dream in a dream: Sheikh Al-Nabulsi says: Whoever sees a camel and owns it will marry or own a house or land. Whoever sees that his camel has died in a dream, this is a sign of the death of his wife or the loss of something for him. His journey may be interrupted if he is traveling. Different interpretations of a dream about a camel. Whoever sees in his sleep a camel that has entered the city, it is a sign of unrest in that city, and whoever milks the camel is not milking it. Like blood, for example, this indicates forbidden money. What had been stolen from him. This is evidence that there are problems between him and his wife that lead to separation. Al-Nabulsi likens the camel to be a good woman who bears a lot of pressure and responsibility on her shoulders, or perhaps she is a very controversial woman, depending on the position of the camel in the dream and the person’s vision of her as howling. Half a camel and a woman's dome. also.

title: Interpretation of seeing buying gold in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of buying gold in a dream through the vision website roy2a.com. Seeing yourself buying gold in a dream has many meanings. The vision can be a good sign or an evil omen. Interpreters differed in the interpretation of buying gold in a dream, depending on the condition and circumstances of the viewer, and whether the man or woman is single, married or pregnant, and today through the Vision website we are discussing the interpretation of the vision of buying gold in a dream in detail, based on the opinion of major interpreters such as Ibn Sirin. Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing buying gold in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? Seeing buying gold in a dream is considered a good vision because it indicates hearing good news and promising things that will happen. Seeing buying gold and wearing it in a dream indicates that the dreamer will be blessed with many children and money. Seeing yourself buying a gold coin in a dream indicates that the fortuneteller will have a prominent position and an important place in his work. Seeing in a dream of buying a gold ring indicates that the dreamer will reach his ambitions and desires in life. See also: Interpretation of seeing gold in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing buying gold in a dream? Al-Nabulsi? Seeing yourself buying gold coins in a dream indicates that God will advance in his work and he will have a great status in society. Seeing a woman alone buying a gold necklace in a dream shows that he will get married soon. See also: Interpretation of seeing yourself wasting gold in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing buying gold in a dream? A single woman? Seeing a woman alone buying gold in a dream shows that she is approaching the date of her marriage to a good man with whom she will live a happy life. Seeing a woman alone buying a gold necklace in a dream shows that promising things will happen in her life in the near future. Seeing a single woman in a dream buying gold and selling it indicates that she is going through a period A difficult time full of problems and crises. Seeing a woman alone buying white gold in a dream shows that she will enter into a romantic relationship with someone who is not suitable for her, but they will break up quickly. Seeing one person buying gold for her in a dream shows that she will soon marry someone she wants and loves. See also: Interpretation of seeing treasure Gold in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing buying gold in a dream for a married woman? Seeing a married woman buying gold and losing it in a dream shows that he will face many problems and disputes in the coming period. Seeing a married woman buying red gold in a dream announces her stable and happy married life. Seeing a married woman buying a gold earring in The dream indicates that God will carry her soon, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman buying a gold bracelet in a dream indicates the end of all the disputes that existed between her and her husband. A married woman seeing her husband buying gold in a dream announces the great love between her and her husband. What is the interpretation of seeing buying gold in a dream? A pregnant woman’s dream? Seeing a pregnant woman buying gold in a dream indicates that she will undergo an easy and accessible birth process. Seeing a pregnant woman buying a gold ring in a dream indicates that she will give birth to a boy, and God knows best. Seeing a pregnant woman indicates

title: Interpretation of seeing an old man in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribersFansInterpretation of seeing an old man in a dreamIt is considered one of the praiseworthy visions in all of his shows because it indicates the psychological calm and tranquility that the viewer enjoys in his real life.Interpretation of seeing an old man in a dream by Ibn SirinThe old man Ibn Sirin says about him in a dream: If a person sees an old man in a dream And signs of righteousness appeared on him, then this indicates the dreamer’s piety and closeness to God Almighty. If the old man appears in a dream and his religion is Christianity, this is evidence of the many differences that the dreamer falls into between him and those who oppose him, and these differences will fluctuate in the coming period. . From his real life. The vision of the old man, and his religion was Judaism, was evidence of the presence of many enemies in the dreamer’s life, so he must be careful, taking care not to harm them. The appearance of an old man in a dream, and signs of illness appeared on him, this tells us about The possibility of contracting a disease that the dreamer will be exposed to in the current period or the coming period, and God knows best. Interpretation of an old man in a dream for a single woman. A free girl sees an old man in a dream. She has many conditions. When she sees her in her dream, she is sitting next to an old man, and it contains good news that she will get A lot of goods and food in abundance. It also indicates that she will find a new job that will have a positive impact on the course of her life. It was mentioned in Ibn Sirin’s interpretations that an unmarried girl seeing an old man in her dream indicates the achievement of the goals that she aspired to in the previous period and the desires that she had always sought. To its fulfillment. If she dreams that she is receiving a gift from the old man, she will hear and receive the good news that will soon make her heart happy, God willing. A naked old man for an unmarried girl in a dream indicates her crises and troubles in the coming period, and God knows best. Seeing her marrying an old man in a dream means That there is someone who wants to marry her, but in reality she does not suit him. Interpretation of seeing elderly people in a dream When seeing elderly people in a dream, its interpretation varies depending on what the dreamer is affected by in reality: the rupture of family ties and the resulting family problems. An old smile in a dream, When the monarch is given food, drink, money, or anything that benefits the fortuneteller, it is one of the promising visions that the fortuneteller must satisfy. title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing watermelon in a dream for a single woman and a married woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing watermelon in a dream: There are many visions that many people see in their dreams and are looking for their connotations that bring happiness, goodness, and a lot of livelihood, or carry warning and warning of bad reputation and inability to bear responsibility. Which depends on the nature of the dream and whether the watermelon is red or rotten, the interpretation of the dream of seeing watermelon in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a watermelon in a dream for the pregnant Nabulsi. The well-known and Nabulsi interpretation scholar also worked on interpreting the forbidden dream about watermelon from its connotations and interpretations based on the nature of the dream and the social status of its owner. The most important of these interpretations are: If you see an unmarried young man or an unmarried girl cutting a watermelon in a dream, this means that the skin will soon get married. Cutting a watermelon in a dream for a married woman shows the love that prevails in the family. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a horse in a dream for a single woman and a woman Married in Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing rotten watermelon in a dream, but if the watermelon you saw in the dream had rotten watermelon, it carries many undesirable connotations that portend and warn against evil. The most obvious interpretations of seeing rotten watermelon in a dream are as follows: Seeing yellow watermelon in a dream indicates the anxiety and distress that the dreamer is going through, in addition to the financial crises he is exposed to. Buying rotten watermelon in a dream is an indication of the bad reputation of the visionary among people. Watermelon indicates Rotten food in a sick man’s dream indicates the seriousness of his illness and the nearness of his death. Yellow watermelon in a dream indicates excessive fatigue and psychological pressure. See also: Interpretation of a dream about breaking a ring in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing red watermelon in a dream. As for seeing red watermelon in a dream, it has many interpretations. The connotations that in some cases herald good for its owner and in other cases correspond to evil, as interpretation scholars have interpreted seeing red watermelon in a dream with a group of connotations. Including: Red watermelon in a dream indicates the arrival of goodness and blessing in money. Seeing a very red watermelon in a prisoner’s dream indicates his freedom and innocence in the near future. Green watermelon rind in a dream indicates psychological disorders and family tension. Red watermelon in a dream is an indication of resolving difficult decisions to achieve goals. And desires. The interpreter Ibn Sirin interpreted eating red watermelon for one person on the basis of close marriage and stability in married life. See also: Interpretation of seeing a dead person giving gold to unmarried and married people in a dream with Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a dead person eating watermelon in a dream. If one sees in a dream that a dead person is eating watermelon This vision has a set of connotations and interpretations that interpretation scholars have worked to clarify and interpret based on the nature of grief in a set of meanings, such as: See also: Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream of seeing drowning in a dream for a single woman and a married woman. A dead person who eats watermelon in a dream is an indicator The dreamer's financial situation improves

title: Interpretation of a dream about tiles in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams and visions of tiles in a dream: Good visions, especially colored tiles, bring many positive signs and good news, while seeing marble can indicate bad events and negative associations. You may also know a lion in a dream. Through today’s article, we will learn about the different interpretations of seeing tiles. In a dream, within the topic of interpretation of dreams and visions, tiles in a dream. Seeing tiles in a dream has good and praiseworthy meanings, and at the same time it can have bad meanings in the vision, and God knows best. A different interpretation of seeing tiles in a dream. Examining tiles in a dream is considered a good dream. And good visions. Tiles in a dream differ depending on the dreamer. Each dreamer must have a different interpretation of his dream according to his personality, and God knows best. Read also: The toilet in a dream. Interpretation of seeing tiles in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s narration. Interpretation of dreams and visions of tiles in a dream. The connotations of seeing tiles in a dream are varied, but all of them are positive and good. Mostly, it portends a lot of goodness, which is what Ibn Kathir mentioned. Seeing tiles in a dream according to Ibn Sirin is associated with many praiseworthy things. God knows best. Seeing tiles in a dream can indicate increasing anxiety, removing sorrows, and getting rid of problems and crises that the dreamer faces. In his life. On the other hand, Ibn Sirin believes that seeing marble in a dream has unfavorable connotations and indicates the difficulties to which the dreamer is exposed, but they will disappear, God willing. Read also: Pregnancy in a dream. Interpretation of seeing tiles in Nabulsi. Seeing tiles in a dream in Nabulsi means good and happy news and may It indicates the fortuneteller’s imminent marriage. God knows best. Al-Nabulsi also interprets it as a good condition, a change for the better, and the removal of worry, sadness, and anguish. While seeing tiles replaced with marble, it is an undesirable vision and warns of bad things happening to the viewer, including failure or loss of work or money, and God knows best. Read also : Penguin in a dream. Interpretation of seeing tiles in a man’s dream. Seeing tiles in a man’s dream has many meanings and positive signs. Seeing tiles in a man’s dream may indicate many good things that happen to the dreamer or relieve him of sorrows and worries. God knows best. Among the indications of seeing tiles broken in a man’s dream is the improvement of his life, the health of his circumstances, and saving the negative problems surrounding him. On the one hand Other, seeing tiles indicates goodness that will replace the dreamer and change his circumstances for the better. Whoever sees in his dream that he is wiping tiles, this is a sign of repentance and abandoning sins and disobedience, walking on the path of righteousness and success, and staying away from the path of Satan. Interpretation of seeing tiles in a dream For a married woman, seeing tiles in a married woman’s dream may indicate calm and stability in her life and many good things for her and her family. It also indicates the success of the visionary in achieving what she wants and seeks, and it may indicate a positive change occurring in her life. God knows best. Interpretation of seeing tiles in a dream Pregnant woman seeing tiles

title: Interpretation of a helmet in a dream: Seeing a helmet in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of a helmet in a dream for a single, married, pregnant, or divorced woman, whether she is wearing a helmet, a black-white hat, or military clothing. The meaning of a helmet, war, and a soldier in a dream: It indicates cover and protection from terror or disasters. If a soldier's helmet indicates safety from harm that awaits the fortuneteller, and a motorcycle helmet indicates a friend or companion who offers the pioneer reasons for comfort and protection. If the helmet that the dreamer sees in his dream is of high value, it indicates a rich and beautiful woman. If its value is not high, It shows an ugly woman, and whoever sees an iron helmet in a dream will gain great means. An egg-shaped helmet indicates safety, fear, or headaches. If the dreamer is single, then the helmet indicates his marriage, and it is also glory and status for enemies. A helmet in a dream indicates If the son is married, the money he gets for them and his honor in his life. A helmet in a dream indicates safety from the enemy, money, and a wife. A helmet means a leader who pays the veil to whoever wears it and belongs to the king, and for an unmarried person it is a wife, honor and status for enemies. Wars in real life are a painful tragedy that leaves negative effects It is dangerous for societies and individuals, so it is considered abhorrent to mention it because of the painful memories, psychological problems, and destruction it leaves behind. The war in your dream symbolizes the conflict within you and with yourself. It is an internal conflict that translates into a violent dream like war and you being chased. And when you remember that you dreamed of war, you need to know what is really bothering you, increasing your anxiety and leading to internal conflict, so that you can deal with this dream. War indicates that there is a conflict in your thoughts about a certain issue or problems that you face and that are confusing you in your life. If your psychological state is bad or you are frustrated and disappointed, then all of this reality will also appear to you in the dream in the form of war and will reflect your realistic psychological state. If you dream of a warplane that flies in good condition and achieves victories, this means that you will fulfill a wish, but if it does not fly or collapse, it means that you are facing a difficult decision and the result will be disappointment. Seeing soldiers approaching the dreamer in a dream means that in reality there are good people who support him and help him in everything he needs. If the dreamer sees that the soldier in a dream is eating from a table that does not belong to him, then this Evidence that he will reach a high position without burden and effort. If the dreamer sees in a dream that his name is included in the list of soldiers, this means that he will get what he usually desires in his life or he will get something that is enough for him. On the other hand, a dream about a soldier is sometimes interpreted negatively : If one sees himself as a soldier, and if he is sick, he will die, and if not, then the subject indicates that he will suffer a great loss. The lack of soldiers in the dream is evidence of victory, and if the dreamer recognizes the soldier in the dream and he is carrying a weapon, it will be clear that ten Who is this good person. At the same time, seeing soldiers in a dream can indicate fear. Interpretation of seeing a helmet in a dream - YouTubeInterpretation of the helmet

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing dust in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing dust in a dream by Ibn Sirin, fine dust particles consist of dust in the atmosphere and come from various sources, such as ground dust resulting from weather conditions such as wind factors, volcanic eruptions, and air pollution. In a dream, it indicates poverty, stress, pain, and lack of livelihood, and seeing dust between the sky and the earth can indicate problems and disputes, and dust in the house can indicate gaining money, according to Ibn Sirin's interpretation. A dream about seeing dust according to Ibn Sirin Similarly, the presence of a large amount of dust in a dream can be a reason for the dreamer's happiness and inner happiness. Dust on clothes, long trips, and new business trips indicate the presence of a lot of money. A dream about seeing dust Ibn Shaheen believes that dust in a dream is a large amount of money that the dreamer can obtain after making great efforts. The presence of a large amount of dust and accumulation in the house indicates disbelief and good morals are earning a living and obtaining blessed money in it and giving birth to offspring with morals and religious beliefs, helping parents. Dreaming of seeing dust on the face The dreamer may see in his dream a lot of dust spreading on his face, and this scene reflects the difficulties and great suffering that he experienced at work or study. Poor vision due to dust is nothing but overcoming difficulties and huge crises. Dust in the sky indicates the loss of money and huge business losses. Dreaming of seeing dust for singles in a dream Girl, the accumulation of dust is nothing but distant ambitions and dreams that she seeks and achieves by the command of God. The cleanliness of a person and the dust of the house indicates a decrease in his participation or academic performance. Dust for an unmarried woman in a dream is a very important job. She will get this job in the near future through which she will enjoy a high position among people and enjoy a happy life. Seeing dust for singles is good news and a good reputation among people. Dreaming of seeing powder for a pregnant woman Dust in a married woman's dream represents a big problem for her husband and will disappear soon, and perhaps this indicates successful projects that will generate a lot of money for her and provide a rich source of livelihood. Removing dust from the house indicates the approaching birth. Dreaming of seeing dust in the house means that he takes money from his wife, and whoever sees that he is cleaning his workplace and collecting dirt and dust, this indicates livelihood, livelihood and an increase in material wages. Dirt in a dream can indicate collecting money, but seeing dirt can differ from seeing a person eating dirt. Eating dirt indicates poverty and hunger, as he sees the dirt he eats after sweeping the house. Dreaming of seeing thick bachelor powder Seeing dense air in an unmarried woman's dream indicates psychological problems and pressures on the dreamer. Seeing air The condenser indicates the fulfillment of desires. Seeing dust carried by dust indicates problems that you can overcome. Dreaming of seeing dust for a married woman Seeing wind and storm in a dream means troubles and worries. Also, it can
